description: There is an option for a MS VS Just-In-Time Debugger "vsjitdebugger.exe" to launch specified executable and attach a debugger. This option may be used adversaries to execute malicious code by signed verified binary. The debugger is installed alongside with Microsoft Visual Studio package. Author: Agro (@agro_sev), Ensar Şamil (@sblmsrsn), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: the process spawned by vsjitdebugger.exe is uncommon.
name: Malicious PE Execution by Microsoft Visual Studio Debugger
